concept.title: Main working principles in edit windows
concept.shortdesc: An introduction to the main function principles of the edit windows.

conbody.p: Three buttons do control the window:

ul.li: The edit window itself is updated.
The data is "sent back" to the main application. This means the main applcation and other edit windows will be updated as well.

conbody.p: If you press [OK] two things happen as well:

ul.li: The data is "sent back" to the main application. This means the main applcation and other edit windows will be updated.
The edit window itself will be closed afterwards.

conbody.p: [Cancel] does just close the Edit window. All changes since the last [Apply] button press will be lost!
